name: No Pain, No Gain (dancar)
description:
*** Plays best in fullscreen ***

The goal of each level is to sacrifice yourself enough to unlock the exit.
You do this by intetionally stepping on the traps to lose health. Once you've lost enough and are barely alive, you can make it to the exit :D

Unfortunately I didn't have the time to create more than 7 small levels, so the game is very short :(
I also would've liked to add some more traps and object interactions, but maybe I will do that in the future some day. Who knows

=== Known bugs/quirks ===
None that I know of yet. Please let me know if you find anything!
======================

Controls:

Mouse: Menu interaction
WASD / Arrow keys: Move
R: Restart current level
M: Toggle mute
